text: I have used HubDB dynamic pages for product listings with filters. To achieve the specific URL structure, I have used 2 templates. I just want to remove extra URLs which are built by HubDB dynamic pages. Can that be possible?

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/content/search-for-content>
under *Optional Filter Parameters*
> property	`&property=`	Specifies which properties to search for (defaulting to all properties). Options are title, description, and html. *For blog posts, additional search properties are author_full_name, author_handle, and tag*.
so in search form add `tag` as a hidden field
